div.head: 狐刺尿瘡
div.div: sores resulting from a fox‘s piercing urine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sores resulting from a fox‘s piercing urine

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with hu niao ci zhuang 狐尿刺瘡 , sores resulting from fox urine piercing. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qu 曲 quotes Gu jin lu yan Recipe book. Tang era, ca. 7th century. 古今錄驗 : 狐刺尿瘡：曲末和獨頭蒜，杵如麥 粒，納瘡孔中，蟲出愈 , “ Sores resulting from a fox’s piercing urine : pound yeast powder and a single clove of garlic to the size of wheat grain and insert into the opening of the sores. When a bug has left it will be healed”.
